trans-unit.source: Represents a reflectable reference to the <xref:System.Array> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示可反映參考<xref:System.Array>類別。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: This class stores the element type of a typed array, but this class does not store data.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會儲存在具類型陣列的項目類型，但這個類別不會儲存資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The element type of a typed array.
trans-unit.target: 具類型陣列的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The rank (number of dimensions) of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列陣序 （維度數目）。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified typed array has the same element type and rank as the current typed array.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的型別的陣列是否有相同的項目類型和為目前的具類型陣列的陣序規範。

trans-unit.source: The typed array to compare with the current typed array.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的類型陣列比較具類型的陣列。

trans-unit.source: if obj has the same element type and rank as the current typed array; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 具有相同的項目類型和陣序規範為目前的具類型陣列; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a field of the <xref:System.Array> class type that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得欄位<xref:System.Array>類別具有指定的名稱的類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: A field that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名稱，如果有; 的欄位否則為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects that correspond to all fields of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>對應至所有欄位的物件<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains all fields of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，包含的所有欄位<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the element type of the typed array.
trans-unit.target: 可做為具類型陣列的項目類型的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects that correspond to all members of the <xref:System.Array> class type that match a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>對應到的所有成員的物件<xref:System.Array>類別符合指定的名稱的類型。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that match the name argument.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，符合 name 引數。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects that correspond to all members of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>對應到的所有成員的物件<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains all members of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，包含的所有成員<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets a method of the <xref:System.Array> class type that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得的方法<xref:System.Array>類別具有指定的名稱的類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: A method that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名稱，如果有; 的方法否則為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets a method of the <xref:System.Array> class type that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: 取得的方法<xref:System.Array>類別具有指定的名稱，使用指定的選取準則的類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，會執行實際引數類型的類型轉換成正式引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The parameter types that are used to locate a matching method.
trans-unit.target: 用來尋找相符的方法之參數類型。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 啟用繫結搭配使用的型別已修改的參數簽章的參數修飾詞的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A method that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名稱，如果有; 的方法否則為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> objects that correspond to all methods of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>對應到的所有方法的物件<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains all methods of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，包含的所有方法<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects that correspond to all properties of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>對應到的所有屬性的物件<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains all properties of the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，包含的所有屬性<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets a property of the <xref:System.Array> class type that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性<xref:System.Array>類別具有指定的名稱的類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: A property that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名稱，如果有; 的屬性否則為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets a property of the <xref:System.Array> class type that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性<xref:System.Array>類別具有指定的名稱，使用指定的選取準則的類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，會執行實際引數類型的類型轉換成正式引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the return value that the property must have.
trans-unit.target: 屬性必須有傳回值的類型。

trans-unit.source: The index types of the property being searched for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之屬性的索引類型。

trans-unit.source: Used for index properties, such as the indexer for a class.
trans-unit.target: 用於索引的屬性，例如類別的索引子。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 啟用繫結搭配使用的型別已修改的參數簽章的參數修飾詞的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A property that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的名稱，如果有; 的屬性否則為 null。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified member of the element type or the <xref:System.Array> class type.
trans-unit.target: 叫用指定的項目類型的成員或<xref:System.Array>類別類型。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: This method can use late binding to invoke the member on the element type of the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以使用晚期繫結叫用陣列的項目類型上的成員。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用之成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，指定由反映執行的成員搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，會執行實際引數類型的類型轉換成正式引數型別。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the member.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用成員上的物件。

trans-unit.source: This must be the current script object.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是目前的指令碼物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列，其中包含要叫用數目、 順序和類型成員的參數。

trans-unit.source: This is an empty array if there are no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何參數，這會是空陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array that has the same length as the `args` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中具有相同的長度為`args`參數。

trans-unit.source: It represents the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 它表示叫用的成員引數屬性中繼資料中。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.
trans-unit.target: 提供特定文化特性或地區設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
trans-unit.target: 用來正確地格式化數字、 日期和字串。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the call to the member.
trans-unit.target: 成員呼叫的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the element type of the typed array and the rank information.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含型別的陣列，陣序資訊的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the element type of the typed array and the rank information.
trans-unit.target: 包含型別的陣列，陣序資訊的項目類型的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property gets the type of the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray> object itself, not the element type of the typed array.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性取得的型別<xref:Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray>物件本身，不具類型陣列的項目類型。</xref:Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray>

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.TypedArray"></xref>物件。
